channel.title: Chelan County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Chelan County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-97 south. Distance to Cle Elum (via WA-970), Ellensburg, and Seattle (via WA-970 and I-90). This type of distance marker with the route name on top is not typical in Washington.

item.title: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct. Continue south for US-97/To I-90/To WA-970 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. Turn left for US-2 East/US-97 North onramp to Wenatchee. US-97 south leaves US-2 westbound here.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South At US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at the US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 Split. Use US-97 south for WA-970/I-90 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. A variable speed limit sign shows the speed as 60 MPH.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285 in Wenatchee. Merge left for (WA-285 South) to Ellensburg. Continue straight for US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285. Use right lane for US-2 West/US-97 South to Ellensburg and Seattle. Continue straight for WA-285 South to Wenatchee and Mission Ridge Ski Area.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285 in Wenatchee. Use right lane to continue on US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North to Entiat and Chelan.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-97 Alt. North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-97 Alt. North to Entiat and Chelan. Entering Chelan County and crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-2 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-2 west. Distance to Stevens Pass, Everett, and Seattle.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching Saunders Road
item.description: US-2 west approaching Saunders Road. Use right lane for Saunders Road. Continue west on US-2 for Leavenworth and Seattle.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split. Use US-97 south for WA-970/I-90 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Bus. US-2/US-97
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South - Bus. US-2/US-97 Junction to Cashmere.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass, and Monroe.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Cashmere, Everett, and Seattle.

item.title: End WA-285 North at US-2/US-97/To WA-28
item.description: End WA-285 North at US-2/US-97/To WA-28. Use US-2 East/US-97 North/To WA-28 for Okanogan and Spokane. Use US-2 West/US-97 South for Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct. Use right lane for access to Alt. US-97 to Chelan and Entiat.

item.title: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97/To WA-28
item.description: WA-285 North approaching US-2 East/US-97 North/To WA-28 to Spokane and Seattle. Also approaching Easy St., Penny Road, and Olds Station junction in Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-285 North - Mission St. Jct.
item.description: WA-285 North (Stevens St.) at Mission St. junction. Turn right to continue north on WA-285. Turn left for Mission Ridge (Ski Area) and the hospital.

item.title: WA-285 North at Wenatchee Ave. interchange
item.description: WA-285 North at Wenatchee Ave./Historic Downtown interchange. Entering Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-285 North - Senator George Sellar Bridge
item.description: WA-285 North on the Senator George Sellar Bridge over the Columbia River. Approaching Wenatchee Ave./Ferry St./Malaga-Alcoa Highway.

item.title: WA-285 North - Chelan County
item.description: Entering Chelan County on the Columbia River bridge on WA-285 north. Also entering Wenatchee, the county seat of Chelan County.
